itemdesc-compass-*: Use to see your heading. Takes a second or two for the needle to spin to position.
itemdesc-sextant-*: Use to see your coordinates. Takes a few seconds to home in.
itemdesc-map: Allows you to use the map.
itemdesc-compasstemporal-*: Allows you to see your direction in real-time, no use required!
itemdesc-sextanttemporal-*: Allows you to see your coordinates in real-time, no use required!
